description: Protect your bike while you relax at the café or pause for a quick pit stop. The multiple layers of heat-tempered steel and Kevlar make the Ottolock Cinch Lock light, flexible and hard to chop. Great for training rides when there's no way you'll carry a full-sized bike lock.Lots of stainless steel and Kevlar® layers make it hard to cut.Light but durable aluminum head uses strong and chip-resistant paint.Compact design is easy to carry around.3-digit combination is resettable.
name: Ottolock Cinch Lock
